snippet: By arresting five Indian security officers, the authorities moved swiftly to keep the killing of a teenager from provoking more violence.
abstract: Indian authorities arrest five security officers day after forces shot and killed a teenager during protests over electricity shortages in Indian-administered Kashmir; move is intended to prevent killing from setting off new rounds of demonstrations.
lead_paragraph: By arresting five Indian security officers, the authorities moved swiftly to keep the killing of a teenager from provoking more violence.

headline.seo: Quick Action in Kashmir After Protester’s Death
headline.main: Quick Action in Kashmir After Death of Protester
headline.print_headline: Quick Action In Kashmir After Death Of Protester
